column1: We had a great time at the Lynn Haven 4th of July parade! Happy Independence Day! https://t.co/AID2aKDT4H
Are you ready for @realDonaldTrump rally in Panama City Beach? What are you hoping to hear? #PanhandleStrong
Thank you for your commitment to helping us rebuild the panhandle @realDonaldTrump https://t.co/YaNd5I4tiI
Looking forward to showing @POTUS @realDonaldTrump how far the Panhandle has come since Hurricane Michael tomorrow as well as how far we have to go. #PanhandleStrong

In this Easter season let us pause to remember all those who sacrifice in the service of others. As Americans we sleep safely because brave men & women stand watch over us always ready to come to our aid. Leah & I send to them & to all - our very best wishes for a Happy Easter.

It’s always a pleasure to meet new folks throughout the Second District. I had a great time sitting down with Libby Hutto as well as Syd and Judy Riley from Jackson County last week and discussing my work in Congress. Mrs. Hutto makes a fine pimento cheese sandwich! https://t.co/IIzIvhI6MV
It was great to see so many new faces and catch up with old friends at the Rural Electric Co-op event in Tallahassee this week. https://t.co/4lpLwtSs4z
Great to spend time with representatives from the Second District’s Rural Electric Cooperatives last week. They are doing great work in North Florida! https://t.co/kapCUU7qn6
